meanings.sent1: The orogeny of the Rockies took millions of years.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study orogeny to understand how mountains are created.
meanings.sent3: The orogeny of the hills was so slow, it felt like watching paint dry.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was an orogeny, shaping her into a strong individual.
meanings.sent5: The orogeny of the Himalayas is a majestic sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The study of the processes that form mountain ranges.
meanings.sent1: Learning about orogeny helps geologists understand how mountains are made.
meanings.sent2: Geologists use various tools to explore the mysteries of orogeny.
meanings.sent3: The orogeny class was so interesting, it felt like a thrilling adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for orogeny was like a flame, burning brightly in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on orogeny was filled with colorful illustrations to explain the concepts.
